newsitem.title: USA: SpectraLink expects slight profit in Q3.
newsitem.headline: SpectraLink expects slight profit in Q3.

text.p: SpectraLink Corp said Wednesday that it expects to generate revenues of about $5 million in the third quarter ended September 30.
The company said it also expects to post a slight profit in the quarter.
SpectraLink did not disclose its revenue figures or net earnings for the 1995 third quarter, and did not immediately return calls seeking the information.
The quarter's results are expected to be released October 22.

In this year's second quarter, the company reported sales of $6.2 million compared to $3.9 million for the same period in 1995. During the second quarter, it reported earnings per share of $0.07 compared with $0.01 for the same period in the previous year.
SpectraLink said later Wednesday afternoon that its revenues for the third quarter in 1995 were $4.4 million. During that period it posted net income of $237,000, or $0.01 per share.
